description: After a small earthquake in a tiny, quiet town, local citizens start to exhibit bizarre, violent and self-destructive behaviour.
keywords: earthquake,sex in public,male nudity,earthquake aftermath,child shot in the back
name: Impulse

review.name: Mayberry Goes Bananas...
review.reviewBody:
A small town is hit by an earthquake, somehow causing the townsfolk to lose all sense of propriety.

Enter Jennifer and her boyfriend Stuart (Meg Tilly and Tim Matheson), who arrive to investigate the strange behavior of Jennifer's mum. It doesn't take long for the pair to discern that something's seriously wrong in Pleasantville.

The residents seem to have no self-control as they frolic, fight, shag, and generally misbehave. Jennifer's brother (Bill Paxton) develops a creepy attitude problem. Even the town doctor (Hume Cronyn) has become a menace!

Can Jen and Stu uncover what's going on before succumbing to the madness themselves?

IMPULSE is a solid sci-fi thriller with a host of interesting characters exhibiting bizarre behaviors. Ms. Tilly and Mr. Matheson are very good in their bewildered, sleuthing roles.

Be sure to watch this to the end for a wicked surprise!...
